# Missing Values
A list of economies with values missing in the new dataset.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
missing_values = unctaddf %>%
  filter(str_length(Code) < 4,
         is.na(Value.new) & !is.na(Value.old)) 

missing_values %>% 
  group_by(Code, Variable) %>% 
  summarise(
    Label = Economy_Label.old[1],
    Years = shorten_years(Year)
  ) %>% 
  select(Code, Label, Variable, Years) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
missing_values %>% 
  distinct(Economy_Label.old) %>% 
  arrange(.[1]) %>% 
  pull() %>% 
  map(plot_by_economy) %>% 
  compact() %>% 
  map(ggplotly, dynamicTicks = TRUE) %>% 
  map(layout, title = list(
                font = list(
                  size = 22)),
              legend = list(
                orientation = "h",
                title = ""),
              margin = list(
                b=110
              )) %>% 
  htmltools::tagList() 
```
